name: U13 - The Game
description:
U13 is a first-person exploration adventure made by students of Tomas Bata University in Zlín.

Imagine a future in which education has become a matter of a few mouse clicks. Anyone can use a chip to upload virtually any knowledge without going through long lectures and stressful tests. In a few minutes, you can be a plumber, an economist, or even a nuclear physicist, all painlessly and, most importantly, cheaply. 

You live in an ideal world with only one problem, in the next few seconds, it will disappear in a flash of white light. What happened? Where did they all go? And why do you have such a terrible headache? These are just the first of many questions you will find the answer to in the building of the University of Zlín, which was the only one trying to face the apocalypse. 

- Explore the U13

Authors:
Pavel Novák
Michal Ščuglík
Marek Nieslaník
Martin Nábělek
Ivana Jozeková
Tomáš Halamík

Made in 2014 with the great support of TBU Rectorate
